name: Pawn
description: A basic unit with strong defense. Uses Shield to protect itself from attacks.

name: Bishop
description: A strategic unit with a powerful attack boost ability. Boosts the damage of allies around.

name: Rook
description: A powerful tank with high defense and fortification abilities. Fortifies the team’s defenses.

name: Knight
description: A highly mobile unit with the ability to attack twice in one turn, dealing massive damage.

name: King
description: A royal warrior with massive health and powerful charge attacks. Can break through enemy defenses.

name: Queen
description: A versatile unit with the ability to heal allies. Provides support to the team with her healing ability.
